name: K2 Partnering Solutions
tag_list: crm-salesforce-com-erp, sap-fi, co, sd, mm, pp, ps, apo, srm, xi-pi, netweaver, basis, mdm, icm, bw, bi, bo, bpc, oracle-ebs, fusion, brm, rpas, eai, crm-ms, sap, siebel, crm-salesforce-com, oracle-on-demand, microsoft-ms-dynamics-ax, ms-dynamics-crm, ms-
overview:
K2 Partnering Solutions is a global provider of best in class consultants, within the ERP/BI/CRM/Enterprise 2.0/Green IT/Cloud Computing/CRM Salesforce.com markets

K2 is focus on contract and permanent recruitment. Focussed on the Business Process Technology area, K2 provides Clients with advice, support and expertise in the recruitment of ERP/BI/CRM/Enterprise 2.0/Green IT/CRM Salesforce.com Specialists.

K2 Specialty Areas K2 consultants have expertise in a wide range of industries and technologies including;

CRM Salesforce.com ERP (SAP, Oracle) BI (SAP, Oracle, MS) CRM (SAP CRM, Oracle Siebel CRM, Oracle On Demand, MS Dynamics CRM, CRM CAS) Enterprise 2.0 (SaaS, IaaS, PaaS, Cloud Computing, Mobile Applications, Social Media, Enterprise Risk Management) Green IT (Virtualization, Datacenter Consolidation, IT Infrastructure Analyst)

Global locations: Tokyo, Singapore, Stuttgart, Geneve, London, Sao Paolo, Providence, Boston & San Francisco, Bejing, Shanghai (2012)

Role: Enterprise Head Hunter / Recruitment Consultant // Roles Expertise: IT Professional (Functional and Technical), System Administrators, Project Managers, Pre-Sales, Business Process Support, CIO, CTO, IT Manager // Tech

ERP, CRM, BI, SAP, Oracle, CRM Salesforce.com. Cloud Computing, Green IT
